" HeartSeeker Ahri" Cute
I would buy that {{champion:61}}  skin

Heart...hmmm, would it be heartseeker in Ahri's case?  I feel it needs a different heart-name, kind of like how Annie is sweetheart.  Heartstealer, maybe?  Or if she's being mean about it, Heartbreaker would always work.  Either way, I want this skin.  Please Riot, what I have apparently been missing is another Ahri skin.  Don't make me go without.

EDIT:  Also, Zulidoodles is always fantastic, but that Ori really found a special place in my heart.
Charming Ahri?

Or if she's being mean about it, Heartbreaker would always work.  Either way, I want this skin.  Please Riot, what I have apparently been missing is another Ahri skin.  Don't make me go without.
